item.description:
We will continue with Thomas Hobbes Leviathan. This is a longer work, 640 pages in the edition I have (Penguin Classics ISBN: 0-140-43195-0), although the pages are quite small. I suggest to try to cover the entire Part I: Of Man for our next meeting. It is about 140 pages but small pages and our next meeting, the second Thursday of September is 3 weeks away.
Have a good reading everyone!
item.name: Thomas Hobbes: Leviathan I
